Trade/Device Name(s): NucliSENS EasyQ® MRSA Instrumentation and Software
NucliSENS EasyQ® MRSA assay protocol software
Regulation Name(s): Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Specimen Container(s): Sterile dry flocked swab with transport tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for NucliSENS EasyQ MRSA qualitative assay using NASBA and molecular beacon detection of MRSA DNA from nasal swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for direct detection of MRSA from nasal swabs in patients at risk for nasal colonization, used as a screening tool to aid prevention and control of MRSA infections in health care institutions; not for diagnosing, guiding, or monitoring treatment.
